A video viral on social media is being shared with the claim that it depicts a crowd of people stabbing an 8-year-old’s rapist in the middle of the road in Barabanki, Uttar Pradesh. Several individuals, while praising the act, allege that the rapist was a Muslim.
बाराबंकी में 8 साल की बच्ची के बलात्कारी को चाकुओं से गोद दिया हिंदू भाई ने 🙏 हिंदू जाग रहा है 👌🚩👇 pic.twitter.com/EGsCV6k4r6
— आजाद 🗡️ हिंदुस्तानी 🇮🇳 (@3ai5dggPtoR3cus) June 10, 2019

“अब यही होगा बलात्कारी लोगों के साथ!बाराबंकी में 8 साल की बच्ची के साथ बलात्कारी मुल्ले को बीच सड़क पर चाकुओं से गोद दिया! अब हिन्दू जाग गया है! (Now this is what will happen to rapists. A mulla [Muslim] who raped an 8-year-old girl was stabbed with a knife in the middle of the road in Barabanki.)” – is the caption used to circulate the video.
बाराबंकी में 8 साल की बच्ची से रेप करने वाले को कानून का इंतजार किए बिना ही सजा दे दी इस भाई ने देश का कानून अंधा है इसलिए बलात्कारी को सजा इसी प्रकार मिलनी चाहिए
Posted by Prince Prem Singh Bhati on Sunday, 9 June 2019
A few social media users have shared another clip of the same incident, shot from a different angle.
*बाराबंकी में 8 साल की बच्ची पर रेप करने वाले सुवर के बच्चे को ….* *एक हिन्दू टाइगर ने बीच सड़क राम नाम सत्य कर दिया ..*👇🏻👇🏻👇🏻👇🏻
Posted by योगी सेना on Monday, 10 June 2019
The claim is in wide circulation on Facebook.

Upon searching for the incident with the keywords “man stabbed on road”, Alt News came across news reports from last week by India Today and The News Minute. According to both the reports, the case pertained to Hyderabad and not Uttar Pradesh. The victim, Imitiaz, was not stabbed for raping a minor, but marrying a woman without the consent of her parents. Six persons were arrested for the crime and the police are on the lookout for two others who are absconding. The victim is hospitalised.
India Today’s report carried the same video viral on social media, initially uploaded by passers-by who claimed that the incident took place in SR Nagar.
@khanumarfa @rahulkanwal @fayedsouza Hyderabad. SR Nagar Mei Din Dahade Sadak Per Imtiyaz Naam Wale Navjavan Per Filmi_Andaaz Mei Qatilana Humle Ka Video. pic.twitter.com/pp3RYL49yr
— Mohtashim Akram (@Mohtashim_Akram) June 7, 2019
When Alt News looked for the video on Twitter, using the keyword “SR Nagar”, we came across a tweet by a correspondent of The Hindu, Abhinay Deshpande, who had tweeted the identical clip.
This 20-year-old man was dragged out of the car and hacked with knives in front of his #teen wife by her father and three brothers in #Hyderabad pic.twitter.com/QuyTakWroO
— Abhinay Deshpande|అభినయ్ देशपांडे (@AbhinayTheHindu) June 7, 2019
Deshpande shared another video of the incident shot from a different angle.

According to news reports, a rape case was registered in Barabanki where the survivor was an 8-year-old. However, the viral video is unrelated to this case. The man stabbed in the video is a youth and the accused of the crime was a 40-year-old man named Salim.
